# Publications

```{r}
library(scholar)
library(tibble)
id <- 'Mz4nxtwAAAAJ'
p1 <- get_publications(id)
p <- p1[,c(2, 1, 3, 6, 4, 5)]
p$cites <- paste0("[Citations: ", p$cites, "]")
p <- p[order(p$year, decreasing = T),]
p <- p[-5,] # delete duplicated Inorganic materials

p %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what = title,
    when = year,
    with = author,
    where = journal,
    why = cites
  )

```
